intents.sub_intent: understanding key elements of insurance policies (e.g., 5 P's of insurance)
intents.user_motivation: Users want to learn foundational concepts to make informed decisions about insurance.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are new to insurance or want to optimize their current policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's trusted brand to provide clear, actionable insights on policy design.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle format with actionable tips and visual aids (e.g., infographics).

intents.sub_intent: avoiding common mistakes when dealing with insurance adjusters
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid pitfalls that could negatively impact their claims.
intents.search_context: Users search this after filing a claim or preparing to interact with adjusters.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide expert advice on navigating claims with confidence, emphasizing ING's customer-centric approach.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Step-by-step guide with examples of what to say and avoid.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they get the full value from their insurance claims.
intents.search_context: Users search this during or after filing a claim to understand how to optimize outcomes.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's expertise in simplifying claims processes and offering transparent guidance.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Checklist format with actionable steps and FAQs.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to save money on auto insurance without compromising coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing providers or looking for discounts.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Promote ING's digital tools for comparing insurance rates and managing policies efficiently.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Comparison table with cost-saving tips and ING's unique offerings.

sub_intents: understanding key elements of insurance policies
avoiding common mistakes when dealing with insurance adjusters
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can leverage its digital banking leadership to offer seamless insurance management tools and personalized advice.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a comprehensive insurance hub with interconnected guides, tools, and resources tailored to user needs.

highest_probability_streams: understanding key elements of insurance policies
quick_wins: Create a checklist for maximizing insurance claims.
Develop a comparison tool for auto insurance rates.
Publish a listicle on the 5 P's of insurance.
strategic_priorities: Invest in interactive content like calculators and tools for insurance cost optimization.
Build a long-term content series on navigating insurance claims with confidence.
Expand ING's digital insurance offerings to include personalized recommendations based on user profiles.
